Name: Coffee
Flavor: The socially acceptable drug of choice.
Effect: Reveal immediately after performing an action. Immediately clean your room without taking an extra turn.

Name: Energy Drink
Flavor: Here for a good time, not a long time.
Effect: Reveal immediately after moving into a room. Immediately perform an action there without taking an extra turn.

Name: Enforcer's donut
Flavor: What are you a cop now?
Effect: Reveal when challenging another player. Your challenge is automatically successful, and you do not need to guess a room.

Name: Juice cleanse
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. You may discard this card and one of your face-up mess cards as well. Neither will count towards your score.

Name: Oatmeal
Flavor: A healthy breakfast that runs right through you.
Effect: If you have two bathroom cards at the end of the game, this card is worth 5 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.

Name: Scapegoat
Flavor: It's a little gamey, but it's good for you.
Effect: Reveal after successfully challenging another player. Place one of your face-up mess cards in front of them.
